column2: INTRODUCTION TO LESBIAN, GAY, BISEXUAL AND TRANSGENDERED STUDIES

column2: SOCIAL STUCTURE AND PROCESSES IN EUROPE
column6: Introduction to social life in today's Europe, contrasting the European situation with other parts of the world, predominantly, the United States. This course is only available for semester abroad.

Fundamentals of legal research methods and major sources of American legal literature in print and electronic formats as used in other disciplines. Students learn how to formulate a research plan based on legal analysis of issues using relevant, authoritative legal resources.
